Detailed Description

An 'infinite slider' widget with nudge arrows.

void DzFloatSlider::setDisplayAsPercent ( bool  onOff  ) 

Sets the slider to display as a percentage or a floating point value. When display as percent is on, the value 1.0f will be displayed as 100%.

Parameters:
onOff If true, the slider will display its value as a percentage. If false, the slider will display its value normally.
void DzFloatSlider::setIndeterminate ( bool  onOff,
const QString &  text = QString::null 
)

Sets the slider to display an indeterminate "<Multiple>" value.

Parameters:
onOff If true, the slider will be put into inderterminate mode and display the indeterminate text. If false, the slider will be returned to its normal mode, and display its current value.
text If not empty, the indeterminate text for the slider willbe set to the given text.
void DzFloatSlider::setMax ( float  max  ) 

Set the maximum spinner value. Fails on any attempt to set a maximum that is less than the current minimum.

Parameters:
max The new maximum value for the slider.
void DzFloatSlider::setMin ( float  min  ) 

Set the minimum spinner value. Fails on any attempt to set a minimum that is greater than the current maximum.

Parameters:
min The new minimum value for the slider.
void DzFloatSlider::setMinMax ( float  min,
float  max 
)

Set the spinner value limits. If min is greater than max, the two values will be swapped.

Parameters:
min The new minimum value for the slider.
max The new maximum value for the slider.
void DzFloatSlider::setPosition ( float  pos  )  [virtual]

Sets the current position of the slider to the given value

Parameters:
pos The new position for the slider.

Implements DzSlider.

void DzFloatSlider::setSensitivity ( float  val  ) 

Sets the pixel-to-value scaling that will be applied as the user scrubs the control - this is also the per-click value for the nudge arrows.

Parameters:
val The new sensitivity value for the slider.
void DzFloatSlider::setValue ( float  val  ) 

Set the value slider

Parameters:
val The new value for the slider. If this slider is clamped, and the value is outside of limits, the value will be adjusted to fall within the limits.
void DzFloatSlider::startSpinnerDrag ( int  pos  )  [protected, virtual]

Reimplemented from DzSlider

void DzFloatSlider::step ( bool  positive  )  [virtual]

Steps the slider by its sensitivity value.

Parameters:
positive If true, the slider's value will be incremented by its sensitivity value. If false, the slider's value will be decremented by its sensitivity value.

Implements DzSlider.
